welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coronel, Chile! Known for its beautiful coastline, charming beaches, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the natural beauty and attractions this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Carriel Sur Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Carriel Sur Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
